name: ASSOCIATION FOR COMPETITIVE TECHNOLOGY
sampleDescriptions: Online Privacy - Draft Senate Republican and Democratic bills; healthcare privacy issues.

Connected Health Issues - S. 2741 / H.R. 4832; The WEAR IT Act (draft legislation to update Flex Spending Account/Health Savings Account statuses); Telehealth and digital health generally as part of C
Workforce Development - small business paycheck protection program and related programs in COVID-19 response.
Standard-essential patents - standard-essential patent proposed resolution.
Broadband Connectivity - letters from Congress to the FCC regarding Television White Spaces and Broadband support in infrastructure legislation.
